summary:
Forward DNS requests to Cloudflare Gateway by installing the Cloudflare One Agent on your device. Use this option if:
  • You want to create DNS policies based on user identity.
  • You want to apply consistent policies for both remote and on-site users.
  • You are interested in progressing from DNS-only security to the advanced protection offered by a Secure Web Gateway.
abstract:
By the end of this module, you will be able to:

  • Send DNS traffic to Gateway for filtering.
  • Validate client compatibliity on a test device.
title: Connect to Gateway with the Cloudflare One Agent
